sentences.sContent: The impact of modern technology on the biosphere is evident worldwide.
sentences.sContent_eng: The impact of modern technology on the biosphere is evident worldwide.
sentences.sCn: 现代技术对生物圈的影响在全世界是明显的。

sentences.sContent: The carbon cycle is the biogeochemical cycle by which carbon is exchanged among the biosphere, pedosphere, geosphere, hydrosphere, and atmosphere of the Earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: The carbon cycle is the biogeochemical cycle by which carbon is exchanged among the biosphere, pedosphere, geosphere, hydrosphere, and atmosphere of the Earth.
sentences.sCn: 碳循环是一个生物地质化学循环圈，碳通过此循环在生物圈、土壤圈、地层、水圈、大气中交流。

remMethod.val: bio(生物) + sphere(球， 圈) → 生物圈

words.tran: [生物] 生物分类学；[生物] 生物系统学

trans.tranOther: the part of the world in which animals, plants etc can live
